statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT id, category FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS num_products FROM inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM inventory);
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE price = (SELECT MIN(price) FROM inventory);
SELECT id, category FROM inventory WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM inventory);
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS num_products FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT category, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM inventory GROUP BY category HAVING MAX(price) > 200;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50.00;
SELECT product_name, category FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR category = 'Clothing';
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY category, quantity DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE LOWER(product_name) LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 AND price < 100.00 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Furniture') ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 30.00 GROUP BY category;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM inventory);
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND (quantity > 20 OR price < 15.00);
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity = (SELECT MIN(quantity) FROM inventory);
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM inventory GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics');
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > (SELECT AVG(price) FROM inventory);
SELECT DISTINCT category, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM inventory GROUP BY category;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory WHERE price > ALL(SELECT AVG(price) FROM inventory GROUP BY category);
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, category FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, category FROM sports_equipment WHERE price < 100;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Fitness';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM sports_equipment WHERE category IN ('Fitness', 'Outdoor');
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name FROM sports_equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT AVG(price) FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT SUM(quantity) FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price, category FROM sports_equipment WHERE equipment_id = 100;
SELECT MAX(price) FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT MIN(price) FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE category LIKE '%ball%';
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Outdoor' AND price < 50;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Tennis%';
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE price > (SELECT AVG(price) FROM sports_equipment);
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM sports_equipment GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_quantity FROM sports_equipment GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Football' AND price > 50
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT equipment_name, category, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100
SELECT apparel_name, size, color FROM sports_apparel WHERE color = 'Blue'
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Basketball' OR category = 'Soccer'
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM sports_equipment WHERE price < 30 AND (category = 'Basketball' OR category = 'Football')
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE quantity > 0 AND price <= 50 ORDER BY category, price ASC
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%Ball%'
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM sports_equipment
SELECT equipment_name, category, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM sports_equipment)
SELECT apparel_name, size, color FROM sports_apparel ORDER BY apparel_name ASC, color DESC
SELECT equipment_name, category, quantity, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE quantity > 5 AND price > 25 ORDER BY equipment_name
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1001
SELECT equipment_name, category, quantity FROM sports_equipment WHERE quantity >= 10 AND quantity <= 50 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_equipment FROM sports_equipment
SELECT equipment_name, price * quantity AS total_price FROM sports_equipment
SELECT equipment_name, category, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE category LIKE '%Ball%' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM sports_equipment
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM sports_equipment GROUP BY category
SELECT equipment_name, category, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE price > (SELECT AVG(price) FROM sports_equipment)
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Football' AND quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT product_name, category FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM sports_equipment WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Fitness';
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT MIN(price) AS min_price FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sports_equipment ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM store_locations;
SELECT location_name, address FROM store_locations WHERE manager_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM store_locations WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_records;
SELECT product_name, sales_records.quantity_sold FROM sports_equipment INNER JOIN sales_records ON sports_equipment.product_id = sales_records.product_id;
SELECT category, SUM(sales_records.quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sports_equipment INNER JOIN sales_records ON sports_equipment.product_id = sales_records.product_id GROUP BY category;
SELECT location_name, DATE_FORMAT(sale_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_sale_date FROM store_locations INNER JOIN sales_records ON store_locations.location_id = sales_records.location_id;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE product_name LIKE '%bike%';
SELECT location_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM store_locations INNER JOIN sales_records ON store_locations.location_id = sales_records.location_id GROUP BY location_name;

SELECT store_locations.location_name, AVG(sports_equipment.price) AS avg_price FROM store_locations INNER JOIN sales_records ON store_locations.location_id = sales_records.location_id INNER JOIN sports_equipment ON sales_records.product_id = sports_equipment.product_id GROUP BY store_locations.location_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT * FROM sales_records WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT * FROM store_locations;
SELECT location_name, address, manager_name FROM store_locations;
SELECT * FROM sales_records;
SELECT transaction_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM sales_records;
SELECT se.product_name, se.price, sl.location_name FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id JOIN store_locations sl ON sr.location_id = sl.location_id;
SELECT se.category, COUNT(sr.quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id GROUP BY se.category;

SELECT se.product_name, se.price, sr.quantity_sold, sl.location_name, sl.address FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id JOIN store_locations sl ON sr.location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sr.quantity_sold > 10;

SELECT sl.location_name, SUM(se.price * sr.quantity_sold) AS total_sales FROM store_locations sl JOIN sales_records sr ON sl.location_id = sr.location_id JOIN sports_equipment se ON sr.product_id = se.product_id GROUP BY sl.location_name;
SELECT se.category, AVG(se.price) AS avg_price FROM sports_equipment se GROUP BY se.category HAVING AVG(se.price) > 50;

SELECT se.product_name, sr.sale_date, sl.location_name FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id JOIN store_locations sl ON sr.location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sr.sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT se.product_name, sr.sale_date, sl.location_name FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id JOIN store_locations sl ON sr.location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sr.sale_date BETWEEN DATE SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) AND CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT sl.location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM store_locations sl JOIN sales_records sr ON sl.location_id = sr.location_id GROUP BY sl.location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;

SELECT se.product_name, se.price, sr.quantity_sold, sl.location_name, sr.sale_date FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id JOIN store_locations sl ON sr.location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sl.location_name LIKE 'Store%';

SELECT sl.location_name, AVG(se.price) AS avg_price FROM store_locations sl JOIN sales_records sr ON sl.location_id = sr.location_id JOIN sports_equipment se ON sr.product_id = se.product_id GROUP BY sl.location_name HAVING AVG(se.price) > 75;

SELECT se.product_name, SUM(sr.quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id GROUP BY se.product_name HAVING SUM(sr.quantity_sold) > 100;

SELECT se.product_name, sr.sale_date, sl.address FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id JOIN store_locations sl ON sr.location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sl.address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT sl.location_name, MAX(sr.quantity_sold) AS max_quantity_sold FROM store_locations sl JOIN sales_records sr ON sl.location_id = sr.location_id GROUP BY sl.location_name;

SELECT se.product_name, AVG(sr.quantity_sold) AS avg_quantity_sold FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id GROUP BY se.product_name HAVING AVG(sr.quantity_sold) > 50;

SELECT se.product_name, sr.sale_date, sl.manager_name FROM sports_equipment se JOIN sales_records sr ON se.product_id = sr.product_id JOIN store_locations sl ON sr.location_id = sl.location_id WHERE sl.manager_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT equipment_name, equipment_quantity FROM sports_equipment ORDER BY equipment_quantity DESC;
SELECT apparel_name, apparel_price FROM apparel ORDER BY apparel_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, total_price FROM transactions WHERE quantity >= 2;
SELECT SUM(equipment_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT AVG(total_price) AS avg_price FROM transactions;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT apparel_color, COUNT(*) AS total_apparel FROM apparel GROUP BY apparel_color;
SELECT equipment_type, MAX(equipment_price) AS max_price FROM sports_equipment GROUP BY equipment_type;
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(total_price) AS avg_price FROM transactions GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT equipment_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM transactions GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT apparel_name, CONCAT(apparel_size, ' - ', apparel_color) AS apparel_details FROM apparel;

SELECT name, email FROM suppliers WHERE phone = '123-456-7890';

SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM sales WHERE date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM stock;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM stock WHERE last_stocked < '2022-03-15';
SELECT id, name, category FROM sports_equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT id, size, price FROM apparel WHERE color = 'Blue';
SELECT id, contact_person, phone FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT id, customer_name, total_amount FROM sales WHERE total_amount > 500;
SELECT id, product_id, quantity FROM stock WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Fitness';
SELECT id, name, size, color FROM apparel WHERE size IN ('S', 'M');
SELECT id, product_id, quantity, location FROM stock WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Basketball';
SELECT name, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE price >= 100;
SELECT name, category FROM sports_equipment WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY category;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM sports_equipment;
SELECT name, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE category = 'Soccer' AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM apparel WHERE size = 'M' AND color = 'Blue';
SELECT name, price FROM apparel WHERE price < 50 AND (color = 'Red' OR color = 'Green');
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT name, phone, email FROM suppliers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, customer_name, total_amount FROM sales WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM stock WHERE quantity < 10 AND location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM stock;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount FROM sales;
SELECT name, size, color FROM apparel WHERE name LIKE '%Shirt%';
SELECT name, category, price FROM sports_equipment WHERE category IN ('Tennis', 'Golf') ORDER BY price LIMIT 5;
SELECT s.id, s.name, se.name AS product_name FROM suppliers s INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON s.id = se.id;
SELECT se.name AS product_name, st.quantity AS stocked_quantity, st.location FROM sports_equipment se LEFT JOIN stock st ON se.id = st.product_id;
SELECT a.id AS apparel_id, a.name AS apparel_name, s.name AS supplier_name FROM apparel a JOIN suppliers s ON a.id = s.id;
SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, COUNT(a.id) AS total_apparel_count FROM suppliers s JOIN apparel a ON s.id = a.id GROUP BY s.name HAVING COUNT(a.id) > 3;
SELECT se.name, SUM(st.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sports_equipment se JOIN stock st ON se.id = st.product_id GROUP BY se.name HAVING SUM(st.quantity) > 100;
